quotes.author: Morty
quotes.body: Nobody exists on purpose. Nobody belongs anywhere. We're all going to die. Come watch TV.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: Weddings are basically funerals with cake.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: What about the reality where Hitler cured cancer, Morty? The answer is: Don't think about it.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: It's like the N word and the C word had a baby and it was raised by all the bad words for Jews.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: You're young, you have your whole life ahead of you, and your anal cavity is still taut yet malleable.

quotes.author: Beth
quotes.body: He's not a hot girl. He can't just bail on his life and set up shop in someone else's.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: Those guys are inside you building a piece of shit Ethan!! They're inside you building a monument to compromise!! Fuck them. Fuck those people. Fuck this whole thing Ethan.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: What, so everyone's supposed to sleep every single night now? Y-you realize that nighttime makes up half of all time?

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: It's like Inception Morty, if it's confusing and stupid then so is everyone's favourite movie.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: Jerry get out of the booth, take all your clothes off, and fold yourself 12 times.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: Bummed I didn't get to give that insect dick a try.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: He's a spy, blow him up. I'm gonna go take a shit.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: I'm not looking for judgement, just a yes or no. Can you assimilate a giraffe?

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: There is no god, in your face! One dot muthafucka!

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: 25 shmeckles? I-I-I-I don't even know what that- what is that? Is that a lot?

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: ALLAH BLEHHHH AKBAR

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: I don't like it here Morty. I can't abide bureaucracy. I don't like being told where to go and what to do. I consider it a violation. Did you get those seeds all the way up your butt?

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: I'm sorry Summer, your opinion means very little to me.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: ISN'T IT OBVIOUS MORTY? I FROZE HIM.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: Sometimes science is a lot more art, than science. A lot of people don't get that.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: There is no god, Summer; gotta rip that band-aid off now you'll thank me later.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: WUBBA LUBBA DUB DUB!!!

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: Oh, I'm sorry Morty, are you the scientist or are you the kid who wanted to get laid?

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: Well, she's my daughter, Summer. I outrank you. Or, family means nothing, in which case, don't play that card.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: We're gonna nine eleven this bitch unless Morty gets better grades in Math!

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: You know what a vole is, Morty? YOU KNOW WHAT A VOLE IS?

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: You're growing up fast, Morty. You're growing into a great big thorn straight into my ass...

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: You're not gonna believe this, because it usually never happens, but I made a mistake

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: GRAAAAAASSSSSSS.... tastes bad.

quotes.author: Rick
quotes.body: Lick, lickity, lick my balls!

quotes.author: Goldenfold
quotes.body: Nice, Mrs Pancakes. Real nice.

quotes.author: Goldenfold
quotes.body: Oh my god, how could I not see this coming? My lust, *sob* my greed! I deserve thiiiiii- (Rick cures him) Ladies, let's get out of here. I haven't learned a thiiiiiing!

quotes.author: Jerry
quotes.body: Life is effort and I'll stop when I die!

quotes.author: Jerry
quotes.body: Are you hungry for apples? ARE YOU HUNGRY FOR APPLESSS!?

quotes.author: Jerry
quotes.body: Hmmm... human music.

quotes.author: Jerry
quotes.body: God? God's turning people into insect monsters Beth. I'm the one beating them to death. Thank me.

quotes.author: Jerry
quotes.body: I'm Mr. Crowbar, and here is my friend, who is also a crowbar!

quotes.author: Jerry
quotes.body: Nobody's killing me until after I catch my wife with another man.

quotes.author: Mr. Meeseeks
quotes.body: HI! I'M MR MEESEEKS! LOOK AT ME!

quotes.author: Mr. Meeseeks
quotes.body: Existence is pain to a meeseeks Jerry, and we will do anything to alleviate that pain.

quotes.author: Mr. Meeseeks
quotes.body: Dont look at me! that guy over there...roped ME into this

quotes.author: Mr. Meeseeks
quotes.body: Meeseeks were not born into this world fumbling for meaning, Jerry!

quotes.author: Mr. Meeseeks
quotes.body: "Is he keeping his shoulders square?" "Oooooooh he's tryin'!"

quotes.author: Mr. Meeseeks
quotes.body: Ooohhh can do.

quotes.author: Morty
quotes.body: You're like Hitler, except...Hitler cared about Germany, or something

quotes.author: Principal Vagina
quotes.body: This is Principal Vagina. No relation.

quotes.author: Principal Vagina
quotes.body: ...and there's NO EVIDENCE that a Latino student did it.

quotes.author: Principal Vagina
quotes.body: Hi! Principal Vagina: the name's real, possibly Scandinavian.

quotes.author: Interdimensional Cable
quotes.body: Alien Invasion Tomato Monster Mexican Armada Brothers Who Are Just Regular Brothers Running In A Van From An Asteroid And All Sorts Of Things: The Movie

quotes.author: Mr. Booby Buyer
quotes.body: I am Mr. Booby Buyer. I'll buy those boobies for 25 schmeckles!

quotes.author: Mailman
quotes.body: My Man!

quotes.author: Slippery Stair
quotes.body: My name is Slip- Slippery Stair. I'll take ya down there for 25 SHMECK-ELS!
